### U66 Boiler Replacement Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal

The National Research Council Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the U66 Boiler Replacement project. The project involves the replacement of boilers at Building U66 and the installation of new boilers at Building U66A located on the Uplands Campus of the National Research Council of Canada.

#### Project Overview

The project will require contractors with experience in mechanical construction services. The successful bidder will be responsible for the replacement of the existing boilers and the installation of new boilers, as well as any associated work.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The technical merit will be assessed based on the following criteria:

* Mandatory requirements, including experience in mechanical construction services, qualifications of the construction site supervisor, and qualifications of the project manager
* Evaluated technical criteria, including demonstrated experience, qualifications of the proposed construction site supervisor and project manager, experience with asbestos abatement sub-contractors, and construction schedule

#### Mandatory Requirements

To be considered for this project, bidders must meet the following mandatory requirements:

* Have a minimum of ten (10) years’ experience in the execution of mechanical project and as a contractor providing construction services comparable to this project
* Supply a CV for the proposed construction site supervisor
* Supply a CV for the proposed construction project manager

#### Evaluation Process

The evaluation process will consist of two stages:

* Stage 1: Technical evaluation, which will assess the technical merit of the proposals based on the evaluation criteria
* Stage 2: Price evaluation, which will assess the price submitted by the contractors

#### Security Requirements

The project has mandatory security requirements, including:

* Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD)
* Comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual

#### Tender Closing and Evaluation Process

The tender closing date is May 18, 2023, at 14:00. The proposals will be evaluated and the results will be announced subsequently.

#### Important Dates and Contact Information

* Mandatory site visit: April 26th and 27th, 2023
* Tender closing: May 18, 2023, at 14:00
* Departmental representative: Brent Minard
* Contracting authority: Collin Long
